title: Midsummer Mailbag: Luka Doncic vs. Ben Simmons, Harden’s All-Time SG Rank, and 2019 Breakout Candidates | Group Chat
description:
We open up the mailbag in the dog days of August and field questions about dark-horse MVP candidates, James Harden’s usage, the 2019 Sixers, future All-Stars about to make a breakout, and more.

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Justin Verrier

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
